std::wstring getGuid() {
        GUID guid;
        CoCreateGuid(&guid);
        RPC_WSTR guidString;
        UuidToString(&guid, &guidString);
        std::wstring str = (wchar_t*)guidString;
        RpcStringFree(&guidString);
        return str;
}

ILBLinearRGB gammaCorrectColorRGB(const MColor& c, float gamma) {
        // Note that the typename for c is wrong here, 
        // the type is not linear until afterwards
        float maxVal = 1.0f;
        float r = c.r;
        float g = c.g;
        float b = c.b;
        if(r > 1.0f, g > 1.0f, b > 1.0f) {
                maxVal = std::max(r, std::max(g, b));
                r /= maxVal;
                g /= maxVal;
                b /= maxVal;
                MGlobal::displayWarning(L"Color with intensity over 1. This may cause strange effects");
        }
        return ILBLinearRGB(pow(r, gamma) * maxVal, pow(g, gamma) * maxVal, pow(b, gamma) * maxVal);
}

ILBLinearRGBA gammaCorrectColorRGBA(const MColor& c, float gamma) {
        // Note that the typename for c is wrong here, 
        // the type is not linear until afterwards
        float maxVal = 1.0f;
        float r = c.r;
        float g = c.g;
        float b = c.b;
        if(r > 1.0f, g > 1.0f, b > 1.0f) {
                maxVal = std::max(r, std::max(g, b));
                r /= maxVal;
                g /= maxVal;
                b /= maxVal;
                MGlobal::displayWarning(L"Color with intensity over 1. This may cause strange effects");
        }
        return ILBLinearRGBA(pow(r, gamma) * maxVal, pow(g, gamma) * maxVal, pow(b, gamma) * maxVal, c.a);
}

ILBLinearRGBA toLinearBeastColorRGBA(const MColor& col) {
        return gammaCorrectColorRGBA(col, 2.2f);
}

ILBLinearRGB toLinearBeastColorRGB(const MColor& col) {
        return gammaCorrectColorRGB(col, 2.2f);
}

ILBMatrix4x4 toBeastTransform(const MMatrix& m) {
        ILBMatrix4x4 result;
        for(int y = 0; y < 4; ++y) {
                for(int x = 0; x < 4; ++x) {
                        result.m[y * 4 + x] = (float)m(x, y);
                }
        }
        return result;
}

ILBVec3 toBeastVector(const MVector& vec) {
        return ILBVec3(static_cast<float>(vec.x), static_cast<float>(vec.y), static_cast<float>(vec.z));
}

MVector toMayaVector(const ILBVec3& vec) {
        return MVector(static_cast<double>(vec.x), static_cast<double>(vec.y), static_cast<double>(vec.z));
}

MObject findMayaNode(const std::wstring& name) {
        MSelectionList tempSel;
        MStatus status;
        status = tempSel.add(name.c_str());
        // findMayaNode is used to test if things like persp have been created yet, so we don't want to emit an error if the object doesn't exist
        if(status != MStatus::kSuccess) {
                return MObject::kNullObj;
        }
        MObject tempObj;
        status = tempSel.getDependNode(0, tempObj);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(status, MObject::kNullObj);
        if (tempObj == MObject::kNullObj) {
                std::wstring tempString = name;
                tempString.insert(name.find_last_of(':')+1, L"*");
                status = tempSel.add(tempString.c_str());
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(status, MObject::kNullObj);
                status = tempSel.getDependNode(0, tempObj);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN(status, MObject::kNullObj);
        }
        return tempObj;
}

NodeType getNodeType(const MFnDagNode& dagNode, bool checkVisibility) {
        if(dagNode.isIntermediateObject()) {
                return Ignored;
        } else if (dagNode.typeName() == "transform") {
                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < dagNode.childCount(); i++) {
                        MFnDagNode childDagNode(dagNode.child(i));

                        if(childDagNode.isIntermediateObject()) {
                                continue;
                        }
                        // Always export cameras...
                        MString childType = childDagNode.typeName();
                        if (childType == "camera") {
                                return Camera;
                        }
                        // ...only export the others if they're visible
                        MDagPath path;
                        dagNode.getPath(path);
                        if (checkVisibility && !path.isVisible()) {
                                continue;
                        }

                        if (childType == "mesh") {
                                return Mesh;
                        }
                        else if (childType == "pointLight") {
                                return PointLight;
                        }
                        else if (childType == "directionalLight") {
                                return DirectionalLight;
                        }
                        else if (childType == "spotLight") {
                                return SpotLight;
                        }
                        else if (childType == "areaLight") {
                                return AreaLight;
                        }
                        else if (childType == "volumeLight") {
                                return SkyLight;
                        }
                }
        }
        return Ignored;
}

std::wstring getPlugName(const MPlug& plug) {
        return plug.partialName(false, false, false, false, false, true).asWChar();
}

// Gets what node and what output is connected to node and the input with specified name
std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> getConnectedNode(const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& inputName) {
        MPlug inputPlug = node.findPlug(inputName.c_str(), true);
        MPlugArray connectedPlugs;
        bool hasConnections = inputPlug.connectedTo(connectedPlugs, true, true);
        unsigned int length = connectedPlugs.length();
        if(hasConnections && connectedPlugs.length() > 0) {
                MPlug& plug = connectedPlugs[0];
                std::wstring connectedAttribute = getPlugName(plug);
                MObject connectedNode = plug.node();
                return std::make_pair(connectedNode, connectedAttribute);
        }
        return std::make_pair(MObject::kNullObj, L"");
}

void getConnectedNodes(const MFnDependencyNode& node, std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring>>& result) {
        MPlugArray allConnections;
        node.getConnections(allConnections);

        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < allConnections.length(); i++) {
                getConnectedNodes(allConnections[i], result);
        }
}

void getConnectedNodes(MPlug& inputPlug, std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring>>& result) {
        if(inputPlug.isArray()) {
                for(unsigned int i = 0; i < inputPlug.numElements(); ++i) {
                        getConnectedNodes(inputPlug[i], result);
                }
        }

        MPlugArray connectedPlugs;
        inputPlug.connectedTo(connectedPlugs, true, true);
        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < connectedPlugs.length(); i++) {
                MPlug& plug = connectedPlugs[i];
                std::wstring connectedAttribute = getPlugName(plug);
                MObject connectedNode = plug.node();
                result.push_back(std::make_pair(connectedNode, connectedAttribute));
        }
}

void getInstancesFromSelection(MSelectionList& selection, std::vector<MObject>& result) {
        MStatus res;
        MSelectionList children;
        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < selection.length(); ++i) {
                MObject node;
                selection.getDependNode(i, node);

                // We're only interested in dag nodes
                MFnDagNode dagNode(node, &res);
                if (res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                        if (getNodeType(dagNode) == Mesh) {
                                // So here's something we can bake
                                result.push_back(dagNode.object());
                        } else {
                                // This is something else but it may have children we can bake.
                                for (unsigned int i = 0; i < dagNode.childCount(); i++) {
                                        children.add(dagNode.child(i));
                                }
                        }
                }
        }

        if (!children.isEmpty()) {
                getInstancesFromSelection(children, result);
        }
}

bool setCompoundPlugValue(const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& attr, int2 value) {
        bool res1 = setPlugValue(node, attr, value[0], 0);
        bool res2 = setPlugValue(node, attr, value[1], 1);
        return res1 && res2;
}

bool getCompoundPlugValue(const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& attr, int2& value) {
        bool res1 = getPlugValue(node, attr, value[0], 0);
        bool res2 = getPlugValue(node, attr, value[1], 1);
        return res1 && res2;
}

bool getCompoundPlugValue(const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& attr, float2& value) {
        bool res1 = getPlugValue(node, attr, value[0], 0);
        bool res2 = getPlugValue(node, attr, value[1], 1);
        return res1 && res2;
}

// Returns true if the node was exported and false if it was ignored
bool exportDagNode(const MDagPath& dp, SceneManager& sceneManager, BeastCameraPtr& renderCam) {
        std::string debugWhoIsThis = dp.fullPathName().asChar();

        switch(getNodeType(dp)) {
                case Mesh:
                {
                        sceneManager.createInstance(dp);
                        break;
                }
                case Camera:
                {
                        BeastCameraPtr cam = sceneManager.createCamera(dp);
                        if(cam) {
                                // For now, assume there is one perspective camera
                                renderCam = cam;
                        }
                        break;
                }
                case PointLight:
                {
                        sceneManager.createPointLight(dp);
                        break;
                }
                case SpotLight:
                {
                        sceneManager.createSpotLight(dp);
                        break;
                }
                case DirectionalLight:
                {
                        sceneManager.createDirectionalLight(dp);
                        break;
                }
                case AreaLight:
                {
                        sceneManager.createAreaLight(dp);
                        break;
                }
                case SkyLight:
                {
                        sceneManager.createSkyLight(dp);
                        break;
                }
                default:
                {
                        return false;
                }
        }
        return true;
}

void removeNode(const MObject& obj, SceneManager& sceneManager) {
        sceneManager.removeInstance(obj);
        sceneManager.removeLight(obj);
        sceneManager.removeCamera(obj);
}

int countRelevantNodes(MItDag& dagIter) {
        int relevantCount = 0;
        while(!dagIter.isDone()) {
                MDagPath dp;
                dagIter.getPath(dp);
                if(getNodeType(dp) != Ignored) {
                        relevantCount++;
                }
                dagIter.next();
        }
        return relevantCount;
}

void exportScene(JobContext& bjc, BeastCameraPtr& renderCam, bool progressBar, bool live) {
        ScopedProgressBar progress(progressBar, L"Beast Export");
        progress.setProgress(0);

        MObject settingsNode = findMayaNode(L"beastSettings");
        if (settingsNode == MObject::kNullObj) {
                // TODO: Create new beast settings here
                return;
        }

        const float currentTime = getCurrentFrameTime();

        // Check if motion blur is enabled
        float motionBlur = 0.0f;
        getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"motionBlur", motionBlur);

        float shutterOpen, shutterClose;
        if (motionBlur > 0.0f) {
                getCameraShutterTimings(currentTime, motionBlur, shutterOpen, shutterClose);
                setCurrentFrameTime(shutterOpen);
        }
        
        BeastScene& scene = bjc.createScene(live);

        const float meterPerWorldUnit = 0.01f; // Internal unit is cm
        scene.setMeterPerWorldUnit(meterPerWorldUnit);

        MItDag dagIter(MItDag::kBreadthFirst, MFn::kInvalid);
        int relevantNodes = countRelevantNodes(dagIter);
        progress.setProgressMax(relevantNodes);

        dagIter.reset();
        int currentNode = 0;
        while(!dagIter.isDone()) {
                MDagPath dp;
                dagIter.getPath(dp);
                bool nodeChanged = exportDagNode(dp, bjc.getSceneManager(), renderCam);
                if(nodeChanged && progressBar) {
                        currentNode++;
                        progress.setProgress(currentNode);
                }
                dagIter.next();
        }
        
        if (motionBlur > 0.0f) {
                
                int motionSteps = 1;
                getPlugValue(settingsNode, L"motionSteps", motionSteps);

                // Create data for motion blur
                bjc.getSceneManager().createMotionData(shutterOpen, shutterClose, motionSteps);

                // Reset the frame time
                setCurrentFrameTime(currentTime);
        }

        scene.end();
}

// Only supports non-array attributes and multi-attributes with indexMatters=false
MStatus connect( const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& attr, const MFnDependencyNode& otherNode, const std::wstring& otherAttr) {
        MStatus res;
        MDGModifier dgm;

        MPlug otherPlug = otherNode.findPlug(otherAttr.c_str(), res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        MString command = L"connectAttr ";
        if(otherPlug.isArray()) {
                command += "-nextAvailable ";
        }

        MString nodeName = node.name();
        MFnDagNode dagNode(node.object(), &res);
        if(res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                nodeName = dagNode.fullPathName();
        }

        MString otherNodeName = otherNode.name();
        MFnDagNode otherDagNode(otherNode.object(), &res);
        if(res == MStatus::kSuccess) {
                otherNodeName = otherDagNode.fullPathName();
        }

        command += nodeName + L"." + attr.c_str() + L" ";
        command += otherNodeName + "." + otherAttr.c_str();
        res = MGlobal::executeCommand(command);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        return MS::kSuccess;
}

MStatus disconnect( const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& attr, const MFnDependencyNode& otherNode, const std::wstring& otherAttr ) {
        MStatus res;
        MDGModifier dgm;

        MPlug plug = node.findPlug(attr.c_str(), res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        MPlug otherPlug = otherNode.findPlug(otherAttr.c_str(), res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        res = dgm.disconnect(plug, otherPlug);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        res = dgm.doIt();
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        return MS::kSuccess;
}

bool isConnected(const MFnDependencyNode& node, const std::wstring& inputName) {
        MPlug inputPlug = node.findPlug(inputName.c_str(), true);
        std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring>> result;
        getConnectedNodes(inputPlug, result);
        return !result.empty();
}

bool inStringArray(const MString& val, const MStringArray& stringArray) {
        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < stringArray.length(); i++) {
                const MString& currentVal = stringArray[i];
                if(val == currentVal) {
                        return true;
                }
        }
        return false;
}

void setCurrentFrameTime(float time) {
        MGlobal::viewFrame(time);
}

float getCurrentFrameTime() {
        double result;
        MGlobal::executeCommand("currentTime -q", result);
        return float(result);
}

void getCameraShutterTimings(float currentTime, float blurLength, float& shutterOpen, float& shutterClose) {
        static const float blurByFrame = 0.4f;
        const float shutterTimeSpan = blurLength * blurByFrame;
        shutterOpen  = currentTime - shutterTimeSpan * 0.5f;
        shutterClose = currentTime + shutterTimeSpan * 0.5f;
}
